title: Panel, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: printed on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 190.5 x 135.5 cm (6 ft. 3 in. x 53 3/8 in.)
description: Decorative panel intended to evoke an earlier period. Romantic groups of figures in a pastoral landscape. The costumes are pastiches of various periods. in brown on ecru.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, early 20th century.Medium: linen
Technique: printed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-381.
